scripts.start: echo '🚀 Starting the app...' && npm run build && node dist/index.js
scripts.build: echo '🔨 Building the app...' && webpack --mode production
scripts.lint: echo '🧹 Linting code...' && eslint . && echo '✅ Linting completed!'
scripts.lint:fix: echo '🛠 Fixing lint issues...' && eslint . --fix && echo '✅ Linting fixes applied!'
scripts.precommit: echo '🔒 Precommit: Linting and testing code...' && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.pretest: echo '🔎 Pretest: Linting code...' && npm run lint
scripts.debug: echo '🐞 Starting the app in debug mode...' && NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect src/index.js
scripts.clean: echo '🧽 Cleaning up...' && rm -rf ./node_modules ./dist ./coverage && rm package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force
scripts.create-zip: echo '📦 Creating ZIP file...' && cd .. && zip -r algorithm-practice-extension.zip algorithm-practice-extension/*
scripts.package-extension: echo '📦 Packaging extension...' && npm run remove-dsstore && npm run create-zip
